org.framed.orm.ui.command.nodes

Class ORMNodeCreateCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
      • org.framed.orm.ui.command.nodes.ORMNodeCreateCommand
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ORMCompartmentGroupingCreateCommand

    public class ORMNodeCreateCommand
extends org.eclipse.gef.commands.Command
    Through this command all Nodes except the Compartments and the Groupings can be created(invoked into the model tree). The Compartments and the Groupings need a extra command, because for their creation their child Rolemodel must be setted as well.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Node node
      The Node to be created.

      Setter for the Container to which the Node should be added.
      void setNode(Node node)
      Setter for the Node, which is created/invoked in this command.
      void undo()
      This command is undone through removing the created Node from the the Container and deleting it's boundaries.
